boardgame.description: Rising Sun is a spiritual successor in the same mythic big box series as Blood Rage: same designer, same artist, same studio and same sculptors._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Rising Sun is a game about honor, negotiation, and warfare in a feudal Japan where the ancient gods (kami) have returned to rebuild the empire._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Whereas the distant ancestor of Blood Rage was Risk, Rising Sun claims Diplomacy as its distant ancestor. Tackle negotiations, alliances, and war. Capture hostages and commit seppuku. The game features an honor track, which rises and falls based on your actions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

I need the money more than I need the game - up for sale is my pre-shipped Kickstarter pledge at the Daimyo level (the only level) containing the Rising Sun core box, Daimyo box, Kami Unbound expansion, and Monster Pack. If the pledge manager is still open at the time of sale, I can try to add on extras at cost. Available extras are the Playmat Board ($30), Artbook ($25), Metal Coin Pack ($20), Dynasty Invasion expansion ($50), and even an extra copy of the game ($100). Shipping is already paid on this game, but if we add on extras I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to add a few dollars for the extra shipping fee. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve set the price only slightly higher than you would have paid at the time of the campaign. I have every expectation that the game will be both amazing and beautiful, but rent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s gone up and that takes priority. Shipping has already been paid, and as such I can only ship domestically in the US. I prefer payment methods that do not charge a fee to the buyer or seller, such as Venmo or Amazon.com gift card. PayPal offers a feeless payment system (Send Money to Friends - you can be the judge on whether applying this system to a BGG purchase is OK in your book), but if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to use Paypal Pay For Goods I would ask you to cover their fee.
